channel.title: Friend Points from Parties
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Friend Points from Parties"

item.title: Re: Friend Points from Parties
item.content:encoded:
The other less expensive parties give less points (of course), but Kamaitatchi is right. A party gives a total of a certain number of points, which is distributed evenly among your allies. If you have only one ally in your team, he/she will get the full amount but if you have three ninja in your team, each of them will get a third of the total points.
The All-Out Bash gives 10k points. I think the Karaoke gives 250 points, and I can't remember how much the 'Research' Expedition gives.

item.title: Re: Friend Points from Parties
item.content:encoded: I have a guessâ€¦ When I took the most expensive party all three allies gained 3333 friendship points. So my guess is that the game "distributes" 10000 points amongst your allies

item.title: Friend Points from Parties
item.content:encoded: Does anyone know how many you get?
